  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_91044</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Réfraction de l'air sur l'eau</string>
            <string language="en">Refraction from air to water</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Brechung von Luft zu Wasser</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Refraction do ar à água</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Rifrazione da aria ad acqua</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διάθλαση από τον αέρα στο ύδωρ</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Refracción del aire al agua</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Ce diagramme montre un rayon de lumière quand il traverse la  frontière entre l'air et l'eau. Ceci peut être  utilisé dans un exercice sur la réfraction où il faudrait ajouter une légende.</string>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows a ray of light as it crosses the boundary of air and water.  This can be used in a labelling exercise on refraction.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">air</string>
            <string language="en">air</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">courbe de la lumière</string>
            <string language="en">bending of light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">lumière</string>
            <string language="en">Light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">normale</string>
            <string language="en">normal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">réfraction</string>
            <string language="en">refraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">l'eau</string>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt einem Strahl des Lichtes 
als es Kreuze die Grenze der Luft und des Wassers. Dieses kann 
in einer beschriftenden Übung auf Brechung verwendet werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra a um raio da luz como ele 
cruzes o limite do ar e da água. Isto pode ser usado em um 
exercício etiquetando no refraction.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema mostra ad un raggio di luce come 
esso le traverse il contorno di aria e di acqua. Ciò può 
essere usata in un'esercitazione identificante sulla rifrazione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα εμφανίζει μια ακτίνα του φωτός 
καθώς διασχίζει το όριο του αέρα και του ύδατος. Αυτό 
μπορεί να χρησιμοποιηθεί σε μια άσκηση μαρκαρίσματος στη 
διάθλαση.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra a rayo de la luz como él 
cruces el límite del aire y del agua. Esto se puede utilizar en
un ejercicio de etiquetado en la refracción.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Luft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verbiegen des Lichtes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Licht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">normal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Brechung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wasser</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ar</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">dobra da luz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Luz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">normal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">refraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">água</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
